job_title: Software Engineering PMTS, Cloud Service Ownership
job_description:
• Partner with Product and Security teams to integrate advanced capabilities and ensure compliance with enterprise requirements (Hyperforce, SDB).
• 8+ years of senior-level experience in DevOps and/or extreme accountable service ownership duties, Platform Engineering, or Site Reliability Engineering at enterprise scale.
• Expert-level programming skills in at least one language such as Python, NodeJS, or Java.
• Comprehensive experience with Infrastructure as Code at scale (Terraform Enterprise, custom tooling).
• Proven leadership experience including technical mentoring, project leadership, and cross-functional collaboration.

job_title: New College Grad - DRAM Device and Process Integration Engineer
job_description:
• Make sure that the Espec satisfies all production-grade requirements.
• Strong knowledge of semiconductor device physics is required.
• Monitor and maintain device performance on the production line.
